title: School Learning Environment Design Project Utilizing Educational Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theory and Secondary Education Field Experience
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service educators in healthcare, legal, and technical fields to develop learning environment design competencies in language education contexts

learning_goals: Development of a learning environment design plan applying the six dimensions of the educational leadership model (protecting instructional time, maintaining high visibility, providing teacher incentives, promoting professional development, motivating learning, and setting high expectations).
Development of a customized language learning environment prototype reflecting learner characteristics analysis through PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
Establishment of feasible learning management strategies considering limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
